anime.empty: Please add a RSS subscription first.

download.empty_server: Please add a download server first.
download.empty_torrents: No torrents found in all download servers
download.alert: This action will delete the task from the download server, but the downloaded files will not be deleted.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose how Nyaatify looks to you.

language.title: Language
language.description: This is the language of Nyaatify. This setting is saved in your browser.

add.title: Add a New RSS Subscription
add.description: Add a Nyaa or Mikan RSS subscription to track anime publication. After adding, you need to wait a few minutes to parse all data and show on the home page.
add.name: Name

validate.name1: Name must be at least 2 characters
validate.name2: Name must be less than 40 characters
validate.url2: URL must start with http or https
validate.api2: API URL must start with http or https
validate.api3: API URL must not end with /

subscription.title: RSS Subscription
subscription.empty: Please add a RSS subscription first.
subscription.alert: This action will delete this RSS subscription permanently. The anime included in this RSS will also be DELETED.

ai.title: AI Parsing
ai.description: When parsing titles, prioritize utilizing AI to accurately extract anime titles. The selected model should be compatible with OpenAI interfaces, such as ChatGPT, Gemini, DeepSeek, Kimi, etc. To ensure accuracy, try not to use the lowest grade Lite model. Each parsing consumes approximately 200 tokens.

toast.fetch: Failed to fetch download server list
toast.testfailed: Failed to connect to download server

add.title: Add a New Download Server
add.description: Add a download server to manage your download tasks.
add.name: Name
add.type_notice_qb: Notice: qBittorrent minimum compatible version is 4.1.0
add.type_notice_tr: Notice: Transmission minimum compatible version is 1.0
add.type_notice_ar: Notice: Aria2 minimum compatible version is 1.0

validate.name1: Name must be at least 2 characters
validate.name2: Name must be less than 40 characters
validate.url2: URL must start with http or https

servers.title: Download Servers
servers.empty: Please add a download server first.
servers.alert: This action will delete this download server permanently.

default.title: Default Download Server
default.description: When multiple download servers added, you can manually specify the default server. When creating download tasks, Nyaatify will prioritize downloading through this server.

version.title: Version
version.description: This is the version of Nyaatify. You can check the latest version on GitHub.
